description._content: O'Sullivan, Timothy H., 1840-1882, photographer. Green R[iver] near Flaming Gorge [Utah] [1872] 1 photographic print : albumen. Notes: Photograph shows river curving through canyon. Plate 50 or 51? from: Geological Exploration of the Fortieth Parallel / United States Army Corps of Engineers; Clarence King, geologist in charge. [Washington, D.C.; 187-?]. Title from item. Published in: Framing the West: The Survey Photographs of Timothy H. O'Sullivan / Toby Jurovics, Carol M. Johnson, Glenn Willumson, and William F. Stapp. New Haven: Yale University Press, 2010, plate 69. Subjects: United States Geological Exploration of the Fortieth Parallel--(1867-1881) Canyons--Utah--1870-1880. Rivers--Utah--1870-1880. Format: Expedition photographs--1870-1880. Landscape photographs--1870-1880. Albumen prints--1870-1880. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.11830 Call Number: LOT 7096, no. 44
